title: Unlicensed Psychologist

fields.name: Therapy Session (x0, Charge 60%):
fields.value: Target a player. You will learn if they have ever committed a kill this game. If you shared a Hello Neighbor with them in the previous Evening, you will also learn when the kill was.

fields.name: This is why my License was Revoked (x1, Locked):
fields.value: This ability is unlocked at the start of Night 4 or when you score a cumulative 160%. Target a player that you have used Therapy Session on. They will hit themselves with an Attack Power of either their own or 1.0x, whichever is higher.

fields.name: Oops (Passive):
fields.value: If you kill a Town player with the above ability, your Defense Power permanently drops to 0.1x, and any protective abilities used on you will fail.

desc:
Post 181
*Go on. Tell me everything.* (Inspired by Euclidean Norm's Ironclad Mafia)
